metadata.name: Blk Orchid Ft. Kelard Tha Lyricist-Show Yuh Music Video
metadata.description:
Blk Orchid & Kelard Tha Lyricist perform Show Yuh in this steamy , yet fun video shot during the beginning of the pandemic starting in November 2020. in fact , the whole crew became ill with COVID-19 during the filming , our director being affected the most. But we came out of that adversity to create an amazing piece of art in video form. The song tells a story about someone feeling frisky and wanting their lover to come over ;) We wanted to bring this video to the blockchain because we wanted a permanent record of Dancehall's foray into Web3, we are very passionate about Dancehall and the culture and this is a great way to preserve it. 

The collector of this video will receive exclusive unlockable content including:

HQ Stills from the video  
BTS footage of the shoot  
Autographed poster of Orchid and Kelard Tha Lyricist  
Exclusive copy of demos and remixes of the 

Thank you for your support of our art!


Show Yuh

Performed by Blk Orchid and Kelard Tha Lyricist  
Written by Renee Brown and Kellan Harding  
Video Directed by Tess Francis of Ironhorse Productions  
Shot at Vision Room Studios and in Stoney Creek, Ontario Canada  
Wardrobe: Self Styled  
MUA: Keke M of Revelled in Radiance

attributes.value: Blk Orchid ft. Kelard Tha Lyricist
